title.rendered: “IDF Apprehends Notorious Terrorists in Strategic Operation: Inside the Alma’atzam Ballah School Take Down”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

A terrorist affiliated with al-Nachba and a terrorist who participated in a massacre on October 7th were apprehended in the “Alma’atzam Ballah” school in the Rimal neighborhood in Gaza, and were interrogated by investigators of 504 unit.

Last Friday, an operation was conducted by the combat team of the 401 Brigade at the “Alma’atzam Ballah” school in the Rimal neighborhood in Gaza city. During the clashes, many terrorists were killed and terrorists from the Hamas and PIJ terrorist organizations were arrested. The terrorists were captured by the force and transferred to the investigation of unit 504 of the Intelligence Directorate, including a terrorist from al-Nachba and a terrorist who participated in the massacre on October 7th.

Attached is a graphic of the arrests of terrorists captured in operation: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC18122023.54879
